text: The 2001 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship ==Qualification== *Semi-Final A: **May 20, 2001 ** Motala *Semi-Final B: **June 10, 2001 ** Rivne *Semi-Final C: **June 17, 2001 ** Diedenbergen ==Final== *5 or October 6, 2001 (?) * Pardubice ==See also== 2001 Euro I J
title: 2001 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
